meanings.sent1: The store accepts returnable items within 30 days.
meanings.sent2: The library books are returnable after two weeks.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how the lost sock became returnable after being found under the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a returnable gift, always coming back to brighten your day.
meanings.sent5: The returnable package was as easy to send back as it was to receive.

meanings.sent1: Please make sure the product is in returnable condition before sending it back.
meanings.sent2: The online store offers returnable shipping labels for convenience.
meanings.sent3: The returnable puppy at the shelter found a loving home in no time.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a returnable gesture, always ready to be reciprocated.
meanings.sent5: The returnable policy made shopping online worry-free.

meanings.sent1: The borrowed tools are returnable once you finish your project.
meanings.sent2: The rental car is returnable at any of their locations.
meanings.sent3: It's amusing how his jokes are returnable, always making a comeback.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like a returnable boomerang, always finding its way back to him.
